# ce-spinner

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Shadow Parts

| Part     | Description |
| -------- | ----------- |
| `"base"` |             |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                | Description                           |
| ------------------- | ------------------------------------- |
| `--indicator-color` | The color of the spinner's indicator. |
| `--stroke-width`    | The width of the indicator.           |
| `--track-color`     | The color of the spinner's track.     |


## Dependencies

### Used by

 - [sc-block-ui](../block-ui)
 - [sc-button](../button)
 - [sc-select](../select)

### Graph
```mermaid
graph TD;
  sc-block-ui --> sc-spinner
  sc-button --> sc-spinner
  sc-select --> sc-spinner
  style sc-spinner fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
```
